entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
